mapper.insert: insert into product_img_tbl(pro_num, img_name, img_folder, is_thumb, sort_order) values(#{pro_num}, #{img_name}, #{img_folder}, #{is_thumb}, #{sort_order})
mapper.select: select img_id, pro_num, img_name, img_folder, is_thumb, sort_order from product_img_tbl where pro_num = #{pro_num} order by sort_order asc, img_id asc
